SEARCH

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
Player class manages player-related data and operations in the virtual pet game. This includes tracking session information, time restrictions, and managing lists of alive and deceased pets.
Author:
Group78

    • Player

      public Player()

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public static void setup()
      Initializes the player's data. If a save file exists, loads the data; otherwise, sets up default values.

    • getAlivePets

      public static String[] getAlivePets()
      Gets the list of currently alive pets.
      Returns:
      Array of alive pet names

    • getDeceasedPets

      public static String[] getDeceasedPets()
      Gets the list of deceased pets.
      Returns:
      Array of deceased pet names

    • setTimeRestrictions

      public static void setTimeRestrictions(LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
      Sets time restrictions for when the game can be played. Currently bypasses parent pass check for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time of allowed play period
      endTime - The end time of allowed play period

    • isWithinTimeRestrictions

      public static boolean isWithinTimeRestrictions()
      Checks if the current time is within the set play time restrictions.
      Returns:
      true if current time is within restrictions, false otherwise

    • getTotalTime

      public static Duration getTotalTime()
      Gets the total time spent playing the game.
      Returns:
      Duration of total play time

    • getAverageSession

      public static float getAverageSession()
      Calculates the average session duration.
      Returns:
      Average session duration in minutes

    • getStartTime

      public static LocalTime getStartTime()
      Gets the start time of the play time restrictions.
      Returns:
      Start time of allowed play period

    • getEndTime

      public static LocalTime getEndTime()
      Gets the end time of the play time restrictions.
      Returns:
      End time of allowed play period

    • incrementSession

      public static void incrementSession()
      Increments the number of play sessions.

    • incrementTime

      public static void incrementTime()
      Increments the total time spent by one second.

    • getPlayerData

      public static Map<String,Object> getPlayerData()
      Retrieves all player data in a Map format.
      Returns:
      Map containing all player data

    • setPlayerData

      public static void setPlayerData(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> playerData)
      Sets player data from a Map. Handles conversion of various data types from the saved format.
      Parameters:
      playerData - Map containing player data to restore

    • petDied

      public static void petDied(String petName)
      Handles the death of a pet by moving it from alive to deceased list and saving the game state.
      Parameters:
      petName - Name of the pet that died

    • revivePet

      public static void revivePet(String petName)
      Revives a deceased pet by moving it back to the alive list and restoring its state.
      Parameters:
      petName - Name of the pet to revive

    • createPet

      public static boolean createPet()
      Creates a new pet if possible and adds it to the alive pets list.
      Returns:
      true if pet was created successfully, false otherwise

    • expandArray

      public static String[] expandArray(String[] original, int newSize)
      Expands a String array to a larger size while preserving existing elements.
      Parameters:
      original - The original array to expand
      newSize - The desired new size of the array
      Returns:
      The expanded array
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if newSize is not greater than original size
